title: Ramona Forever
description: What's going to happen next at the Quimby house? Things are changing quickly for Ramona, who finds that being a grown-up third-grader is hard work. Nothing is the way it used to be. Mr. Quimby worries about finding a teaching job, while Ramona worries about where they'll move if he does. Then Ramona's Aunt Bea says she's getting married in two weeks. This is Ramona's big chance to be a bridesmaid, but can they plan a wedding in such a short amount of time? What will happen next? One surprise seems to follow another. But what will Ramona say about the biggest surprise of all--one that will change her life forever?--back cover
author: Beverly Cleary
